verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> upon the <S%G3391>first<s%> day of the <S%G4521>week<s%>, very early in the <S%G3722%G901>morning<s%>, they <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1909>unto<s%> the <S%G3418>sepulchre<s%>, <S%G5342>bringing<s%> the <S%G759>spices<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> they had <S%G2090>prepared<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> others <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> it came to <S%G1096>pass<s%>, <S%G1722>as<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> were much <S%G1280>perplexed<s%> <S%G4012%G5127%G2532>thereabout<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> stood <S%G2186>by<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G797>shining<s%> <S%G2067>garments<s%>:

<S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G3415>remembered<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4487>words<s%>,

Ought <S%G1163><s%> not <S%G3780><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> to have suffered <S%G3958><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> to enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> ?

<S%G2532>And<s%> they drew <S%G1448>nigh<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G2968>village<s%>, <S%G3757>whither<s%> they <S%G4198>went<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> made as <S%G4364>though<s%> he would have <S%G4198>gone<s%> <S%G4208>further<s%>.

<S%G3004%G3754>Saying<s%>, The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> is <S%G1453>risen<s%> <S%G3689>indeed<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> hath <S%G3700>appeared<s%> to <S%G4613>Simon<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G1834>told<s%> what things were done <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5613>how<s%> he was <S%G1097>known<s%> of <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2800>breaking<s%> of <S%G740>bread<s%>.

Â¶ <S%G1161>And<s%> as <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G5023>thus<s%> <S%G2980>spake<s%>, <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3319>midst<s%> of <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Peace <S%G1515><s%> be unto you <S%G5213><s%> .
<S%G1161>But<s%> they were <S%G4422>terrified<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1719%G1096>affrighted<s%>, and <S%G1380>supposed<s%> that they had <S%G2334>seen<s%> a <S%G4151>spirit<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Why <S%G5101><s%> are ye <S%G2075><s%> troubled <S%G5015><s%> ? and <S%G2532><s%> why <S%G1302><s%> do thoughts <S%G1261><s%> arise <S%G305><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%> ?
<S%G2532>And<s%> when he had <S%G5124>thus<s%> <S%G2036>spoken<s%>, he <S%G1925>shewed<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> his <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> his <S%G4228>feet<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G2983>took<s%> it, and did <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, These <S%G3778><s%> are the words <S%G3056><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I spake <S%G2980><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> , while <S%G5607><s%> I was yet <S%G2089><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> , that <S%G3754><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> , which <S%G3588><s%> were written <S%G1125><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> of Moses <S%G3475><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> in the prophets <S%G4396><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> in the psalms <S%G5568><s%> , concerning <S%G4012><s%> me <S%G1700><s%> .
<S%G5119>Then<s%> opened <S%G1272>he<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3563>understanding<s%>, that they might <S%G4920>understand<s%> the <S%G1124>scriptures<s%>,

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Thus <S%G3754%G3779><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> thus <S%G3779><s%> it behoved <S%G1163><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> to suffer <S%G3958><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> to rise <S%G450><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%> the third <S%G5154><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> :
